name: Text engine v1.0.1 (small)
creator: Ponali
desc: An easy-to-use text engine for JSArt made by Ponali, but the text used is smaller (6x8) than the original.

params.name: txt
params.desc: Text (string): what text to put on the screen

params.name: ox
params.desc: Offset X (number): the X position of the text to render.

params.name: oy
params.desc: Offset Y (number): the Y position of the text to render.

params.name: al
params.desc: Align (number): '0' means left, '1' means center, '2' means right. Not intended for numbers outside of 0-2.
